Name: Pirate Survival Fantasy Shooter
About the game: Pirate Survival Fantasy Shooter This is a VR survival adventure that takes you inside a magical realm full of incredible bloodthirsty creatures. Your entire crew has been slaughtered by the cursed creatures living in these crazy islands and your ship is sinking. Many pirates have lost their lives in these waters. As the only remaining buccaneer on the ship you have to shoot your way out of trouble and survive as long as possible. This VR shooter fully immerses the players into the Caribbean fantasy pirate world of fairy tales and legends. FEATURES: - Beautiful levels with different monsters and challenges - Buy different magic guns with special skills attacks - Insane difficulty survival - Best Scores Leaderboard - Level up your pirate, increase your stats and earn coins by playing - Avoid bullets This game can be played as a normal PC FPS game without any VR headset too. You will never feel sick or discomfort during the game. Become a legendary pirate today or die trying!
